body.name: Serta® Smart Layers™ Hensley Big & Tall Ergonomic Bonded Leather High-Back Chair, Black/Silver

FREE pickup Today ready by 12 PMOffice Depot - Sout Miam Blvd In Morr Mall Order within 3 hrs 45 mins
features: Experience supportive seating with this Serta Smart Layers Hensley high-back chair. The simplistic color combination brings a touch of contemporary style to your office space. Adjustable height and tilt controls enable easy customization for both big and tall users, while the ComfortCoils and 5 layers of foam deliver plush comfort. This Serta Smart Layers Hensley high-back chair features a swivel base and rolls for easy maneuverability.
Backrest with lumbar support lets you maintain proper posture.
Weight capacity tested to support up to 400 lbs.
GREENGUARD certified - certified for low chemical emissions: UL.COM/GG - UL 2818. Ranked in two tiers: Certified and Gold.

Tested to meet ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards - Manufacturer testing has been conducted on this product to meet specific performance requirements and safety standards set forth by the American National Standards Institute (ANSI) and the Business and Institutional Furniture Manufacturers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible chair: It feels like I am sitting on a soft, supportive bed
reviews.reviewText: The chair is aesthetically attractive. It looks nice in my office. However, that is just the surface of what is nice about this chair. The seat is so comfortable. It is soft without sacrificing support. It is incredibly supportive on my back and hips. I was looking at another Serta chair until I sat in this one. I instantly knew I wanted it.When I work, I occasionally lay my head back to rest my neck for a minute. It was important for me to purchase a high back chair because of that. Part of the reason I sat in this chair to try it was because it was a high back. It had been a long day, and I laid my head...that is when I was sold. I felt like my head was resting on a supportive pillow, and I made my decision that I wasn't willing to get any other chair.Even the arm rests are nicely cushioned and supportive.This chair prices better than the original Serta chair I was considering, but cost is not even the reason I chose it. I would have been willing to pay more for this chair, but the better price is another bonus. I would definitely buy this chair again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and very comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this chair
reviews.reviewText: I could sleep ethos chair. It is very comfortable and supports my extra large frame. I weigh around 350lbs and this chair stands up to the punishment. I does have a little creek if sound as I lean back in it, but I can live with that, because my first concern was support. I have an adjustable height desk, which help to store chair underneath, due to the fixed arms. All-in-all a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable office chair
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and very comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top-Notch chair at a reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: Great executive office chair, great price, about $100 lower than local prices, fast shipping, good packaging, new condition and undamaged, easy to assemble with good well-written instructions, only requires the included t-handle allen wrench, high-quality materials, very handsome, adjustable height and tilt, nide padding in seat, thighs, back, arm rests, like the 5 rollers, very stable. This is a fairly big chair though, not for people under 6 foot, so pay attention to the dimensions. Also know that this is a traditional executive chair, so if you're looking for a nouveau mesh office chair with a thousand adjustments, this one isn't for you. But if you're looking for an authentic Serta that's good looking and all-day comfy at a good price, this is your chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For long days
reviews.reviewText: This chair is very comfortable, durable and will not let you down. If you need an office chair this is the one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Low Quality Parts- Had to Modify to Assemble
reviews.reviewText: This is a $500+ chair. The plastic components are cheap and poorly formed. I had to enlarge the holes in the plastic arm frames so that the washers could fit into the holes. (And it wasn’t a quick process- about 45 minutes.) Thankfully I had a drill and proper drill bit to do the work. Now that the chair is assembled, the arms wobble a bit (even though they are fully tightened- and I didn’t affect the contact points of the screws/chair arms when I drilled- I was super careful about that) So, all is all, it was comfortable in the store where I tested it, but now that I’ve ordered it and and assembled it, it’s a disappointment. Not worth the price. (Also, the company ships via cheapest ground shipping (that’s the free option). FEDEX promised it Wednesday, then Thursday, then out for delivery on Friday…. Didn’t arrive until Saturday, and I had to call FEDEX to have them locate the box. Some if this is FEDEX’s fault, some of it is due the “cheapest shipping” selected by the company to maximize their profits) I would pass on the chair, and probably pass on the company too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best office chair ever
reviews.reviewText: I would have liked this to be cheaper. After buying I did see it on sale at office depot for less. But this is an awesome chair.. by far the best office chair I've ever sat in. I've had this for several months and it has helped my back (which would constantly hurt with previous chairs) and is as or maybe even more comfy than my couch. a most excellent chair, seat cushion is so plush.
